title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
OB: No results are returned when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to return the appropriate results.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Use the search functionality in the dialog to search for declarations.
4. Observe that no results are returned.

Expected behavior:
- When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to return the appropriate results.
